review: This works fine, and accomplishes the purpose that I wanted it for, mainly being able to see Amazon streaming content which I wasn't able to do on my other video equipment.  A few concerns however:  I didn't realize that it needed to be plugged in to a power outlet to operate when I ordered it.  Luckily  I had one near to the set that I could use, but this could be a problem for some.  I am happy that the pictures that I have uploaded on the cloud with Amazon Prime are viewable with the stick and was expecting to be able to hear the music that I had on the cloud as well.  For some reason only two albums outs of hundreds that I have uploaded seem to be available for listening with the stick.
author: M. Burrows "mushbigdog"

review: Love it.  It's easy to use and even if you DON'T have a good internet, it will take the buffering a few minutes but then it will play just fine.  My in-laws have less than 5mb download speeds and it was working just fine.  It took about 5min to buffer.  I wish the power cable could be longer, but that is my only complaint so far.  I just got, so I will update in a month.
author: SantoS

review: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he LOVED it! It's easy to use and fun to search all the free titles especially if you have AMAZON PRIME.  I was especially happy about the ease it took in setting it up. For the excellent cost, I would definitely recommend.
author: Maria

review: Great device! Intuitive interface and easy setup. Only complaint...need the ability to change to Standard Definition (SD) like you do when streaming on a PC. Once this option is added, 5 stars.
author: mountainhiker17

review: Love that we can can watch at anytime.  Husband enjoying it more than any of us - very unexpected.  Would like to see more comedies, overall satisfied.
author: Dawn Brosie

review: This is a great product.  You plug it in to your tv and plug it in if you want to and grab the included remote and start searching for what you want to watch.  It is clear, there are many choices and it is simple to use.  I love it.
author: B. L. Pryor "blpreader"

review: The remote control is lacking in style and is boring. My TV has only 2 HDMI ports so I had to but an extender to add more HDMI ports so that I could run Firestick and my DVR. Was surprised I had to have electric connection for the Firestick. I didn't like having to subscribe to other services such as You Tube (no charge) but inconvenient and Hulu (a charge so I did not subscribe). Not sure yet how I use (and why I should/could use) the phone app.I was hoping that the Firestick would give me an additional programming choice from cable but there are not many "free" options on Amazon. My son's comment was "what's the point of this?"
author: Karen Guthrie
